column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Provincial Police from the Office of Investigation and Procedure  detained a Chinese man at 7:30 pm on February 26
column4: 2020. The man was arrested for intentionally causing damage at 11:30 pm on 26 February. at a laundry in Trapeang Treng Village
column6: Siem Reap Province.------Police say the foreigner
column9: damaged property belonging to YUAN JIAN
column10: the Chinese owner of the laundry shop.------The foreigner
column11: was sent to Siem Reap Provincial Court and was held in temporary detention at the provincial court in preparation for the legal case. ------GDI
